definition: a diagrammatic representation of the earth's surface (or part of it), to establish a mapping (of mathematical elements or sets)
details:
noun
- a diagrammatic representation of the earth's surface (or part of it)
- (mathematics) a mathematical relation such that each element of a given set (the domain of the function) is associated with an element of another set (the range of the function)
= synonyms: function
verb
- to establish a mapping (of mathematical elements or sets)
= synonyms: represent
- explore or survey for the purpose of making a map
= example: explore or survey for the purpose of making a map
- make a map of
- depict as if on a map
= example: depict as if on a map
- plan, delineate, or arrange in detail
= example: plan, delineate, or arrange in detail
= synonyms: map out
- locate within a specific region of a chromosome in relation to known DNA or gene sequences
= example: locate within a specific region of a chromosome in relation to known DNA or gene sequences
